p: Masoko and Mamabolo [ 16] reported that the leaves of olive contain tannins, terpenoids, steroids and flavonoids. Preliminary phytochemical screening of Sharma et al. [ 17] revealed the presence of various chemical compounds like alkaloids, glycosides, flavonoids, tannins, phenols of fig leaves extracts. In this respect, Ali et al. [ 18] showed that leaf extracts (aqueous and ethanol) of guava contained alkaloids, tannins, terpenoid, anthraquinone, flavonoids, saponins, glycosides and phenols.
